name: BioCrisis
description:
A.D 20XX, something went wrong, they shouldn't have tried to defeat death, the alert has been given, the virus is on the loose, the lab will be quarantined in 60 seconds.






Only a corridor, the exit is right in front of you!
Throw your grenades, pick-up the medikits and shoot anything that blocks your way!
But don't forget to reload when the clip is empty!






BioCrisis offers features:
● "Light-gun" Shooter Experience
● 16 Colors Pixel Art
● Full Action
● Score
● Music and Sfx By Mathusalemherod
● Atari 520-st Spirit
